information: The company JOHANN STEURER GMBH, is a Wholesaler, founded in 1933, which operates in the Vegetables, edible roots and tubers industry. It also operates in the Fruit, Shellfish and crustaceans, Fish, and Drinks, soft industries. It is based in Bühl, Germany.
